entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: W 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
